title: Korean Recipes
description:
Explore some of the most unique, mouth-watering traditional Korean food that everyone should taste. Our app has many authentic Korean foods that are very easy to make. With meat grilled on the table before you, to boiling stews, to chilies and pickles, you'll still impress any Korean foodie. Korean pan-fried fish, a simple traditional main dish that is very famous among Korean recipes. Kimchi is one of the most famous recipes in Korea. Kimchi is served at nearly every meal. Korean fried chicken is lighter than other styles of fried chicken. Koreans make spicy chicken, grilled chicken, fried chicken and much more. These foods are healthy as well as tasty. Its smell is so tempting that you cannot be away from tasting the chicken.
Korean recipes range from succulent pork to fresh salads, veg-packed fried rice dishes, soups, and family suppers. Many Korean low-fat recipes are very easy to make. In addition to low-fat Korean cuisines, our app contains foods that are regulated by Korean cultural etiquette. Fish and shellfish have been a major part of Korean cuisine. Korean soups are loved by all and served as the main dish also. Korean cuisine uses a wide variety of vegetables, which are often served uncooked, either in salads or pickles, as well as cooked in various stews, stir-fried dishes, and other hot dishes. So most of the Korean foods are healthy. Korean foods can be largely categorised into groups of main staple foods, subsidiary dishes, and dessert. The main dishes are made from grains such as bap (a bowl of rice), juk (porridge), and guksu (noodles).
Learn all the ingredients, followed by a step-by-step procedure
Search and access Millions of varieties of recipes in the most convenient way ever!
Offline Usage
This recipe app will let you manage all your favorite Korean recipes and shopping list offline.
Kitchen Store
Make recipe-hunting faster by using the kitchen store feature! You can add up to five ingredients in the basket. Once you are done, hit "Find Recipes," and you will have tasty recipe ideas in front of you!
Recipe Video
You can search and find thousands of recipe videos that help you to cook delicious Korean foods with step by step video instructions.
Chef Community
Find, explore, share your favorite recipes and cooking ideas with people all around the world.
Download and start cooking yummy and tasty Korean dishes for your loved ones!
